S04bsu001_u:2: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārddhaṃ trayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ /
S04bsu001_u:4: anityā bhikṣavaḥ sarvasaṃskārā adhruvā anāsvāsikā vipariṇāmadharmāṇaḥ /
S04bsu001_u:5: yadyāvat bhikṣavaḥ sarvebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyo 'laṃ nirvartitumalaṃ viraktamalaṃ vimoktum /
S04bsu001_u:6: sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ āmaraṇānta hi jīvita maraṇa paryavasānaṃ nāsti jātasyāmaraṇam /
S04bsu001_u:7_0: yepi te bhikṣavo gṛhapatayo mahāśālakulā brāhmaṇa mahāśālakulākṣatriya mahāśālakulā
S04bsu001_u:8: yepi te bhikṣavaḥ rājānaḥ kṣatriyāśca murddhābhiṣiktā jānapadai śvaryasthāmavīryamanuprāptā mahāntaṃ pṛthvīmaṇḍalamabhinirjityā vasanti /
S04bsu001_u:9: teṣāmapi maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitaṃ maraṇaparyavasānaṃ nāsti jātasyāmaraṇaṃ /
S04bsu001_u:10: yepi te bhikṣavaḥ ṛṣayo vānaprasthāḥ pramukta phalāhārāḥ prabhūktaphala bhojinaḥ pramukta phalena yāpanti teṣāmapi maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvita maraṇaparyavasānaṃ nāsti jātasyāmaraṇaṃ /
S04bsu001_u:11_1: paranirmitavaśavartinodevāsteṣāmapi maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitaṃ maraṇa paryavasānaṃ nāsti jātasyāmaraṇaṃ /
S04bsu001_u:12_0: yepi te bhikṣavo rūpiṇo devāḥ prathamadhyānalābhino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇaḥ
S04bsu001_u:12_1: dvitīya dhyānalābhina parītābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāśvarā stṛtīyadhyāna lābhinaḥparītaśubhā
S04bsu001_u:12_2: apramāṇaśubhā śubhakṛtsnā caturthadhyāna lābhinonabhrakā puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā
S04bsu001_u:12_3: avṛhā atapā sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāścadevāsteṣāmapi maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ
S04bsu001_u:13_0: yepi te bhikṣavaḥ ārūpiṇodevā ākāśānantaāyatanopagā vijñānantyāyatanopagā ākiṃcanyāyatanopagā
S04bsu001_u:13_1: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagāśca devāsteṣāmapi maraṇāntahi jīvita maraṇaṃ paryavasāna
S04bsu001_u:15_0: yepi te bhikṣavo 'rhantaḥ kṣīṇāsravā kṛtakṛtyāḥ kṛtakaraṇīyā apahṛtabhārā anuprāptatvākāthā
S04bsu001_u:16: yepi te bhikṣavaḥ pratyekabuddhā khaḍga viṣāṇakalpā ekamātmāna damayanti ekamātmāna śamayati ekamātmātmānaṃparinirvāyanti teṣāmapi 'yaṃkāyonikṣepaṇadharmaḥ /
S04bsu001_u:17: yepi te bhikṣavastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyak saṃbuddhādaśavalavalinaḥudārārṣamāḥsamyak siṃhanādanādineścaturvaiśāradyadharmārohaṇa vaiśāradyaṃ /
S04bsu001_u:20_0: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavaḥ kumbhakārakṛtāni bhāṇḍāniśrāmānivāpakvāni va bhedanaparyantāni
S04bsu001_u:20_1: bhedana paryavasānānyevameva bhikṣavaḥ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ prāṇināṃ
S04bsu001_u:20_2: āmaraṇāntaṃ hi jīvita maraṇaparyavasānaṃ nāsti jātasyāmaraṇaṃ /
S04bsu001_u:27: tathā saṃskārajāḥ satvā nityaṃ maraṇato bhayaṃ //
S04bsu001_u:30: idamavocad bhagavānāttamanāste ca bhikṣavaḥ sā ca parṣadobhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan /
